isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - ASSEMBLE - STANDARD SHIFTER HOUSING (W/SUPER 10 ON COVER)

svcproc.title: STANDARD SHIFTER HOUSING (W/SUPER 10 ON COVER)
svcproc.para: Inspect shift blocks and shift yokes for wear. Replace if necessary.

Apply Eaton sealant #71208 or Loctite 242 to the shifter housing plugs which are used to plug oil cooler provision holes. The sealant should be applied so that at least 5 complete threads are covered.

Apply Eaton lockwire #1819 or equivalent to all shifter housing assembly set screws in both blocks and yokes. The wire should anchor the capscrew at least 2 complete 360° turns. The lockwire ends should be trimmed and bent out of the way of any part interference.
Keep yoke bars in neutral while assembling.

step1.para: Assemble the 1st & reverse shift yoke assembly ( Figure 130):

step2.para: Install the plunger in the 1st & reverse shift yoke bore, plunger shank to the outside.
Install the spring into the bore over the plunger shank.
Position the washer over the plunger shank.

step1.para: Assemble the 3rd speed block assembly ( Figure 131):

step2.para: Install the plunger in the 3rd shift block bore, plunger shank to the outside.
Install the spring into the bore over the plunger shank.
Install the plug and tighten to compress the spring.
After plug bottoms out, back the plug out 1 to 1 1/2 turns.
Complete the block assembly process by staking the plug through the small hole in block.

step1.para: With the housing rear to the right, lay the assembly on a flat surface ( Figure 132).
Install the center rail in the middle boss ( Figure 132).
As the center rail passes through the first boss, install the shift block ( Figure 132).
Drive the center block roll pin through the centerbar to hold the center block in position ( Figure 133).

figure.caption: Figure 133. Center Block Roll Pin Through Centerbar

step1.para: Install the interlock pin, centered between bosses ( Figure 134).
While installing the top yoke bar, position the shift yoke assembly and block assembly ( Figure 135). The block assembly aligns with shift select block ear.

figure.caption: Figure 135. Block Assembly Aligned With Shift Select Block Ear

step1.para: Install the setscrews; tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque. Lockwire securely.
While installing the bottom yoke bar, position the shift yoke ( Figure 136). The block assembly aligns with shift select block ear.
Install the setscrew; tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque. Lockwire securely.
Install the oil trough and oil trough retaining bolts; tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque ( Figure 136).
